amendment.description: Amendment requires the total number of employees that voluntarily separated and the percentage of those employees that took the voluntary exit survey.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 115-39 to require the total number of employees that voluntarily separated and the percentage of those employees that took the voluntary exit survey.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hanabusa amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 400 - 8 (Roll no. 170).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Ms. Hanabusa.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hanabusa amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 400 - 8 (Roll no. 170).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
